item.description:
On-water practices are well underway, and we're gearing up for our first race in June, which is also local in Boston! All paddlers, regardless of experience are welcome, including first time paddlers! It's a lot of fun, not to mention a great workout. Bring clothes you don't mind getting wet, non cotton synthetic material recommended. Paddles and life jackets are provided

Email one of the meetup organizers or RSVP to the event to get started!
item.name: Thursday practice (New members welcome)
